title: Poisoned Russian spy's daughter 'rapidly improving'
text:
Poisoned Russian spy's daughter 'rapidly improving' 2:26pm IST - 01:14 
Yulia Skripal, who was poisoned along with ex-spy father Sergei Skripal, is no longer in critical condition and is 'improving rapidly', according to doctors treating her. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Yulia Skripal, who was poisoned along with ex-spy father Sergei Skripal, is no longer in critical condition and is 'improving rapidly', according to doctors treating her. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2J23ePr
